post.title: fs: bnib iphone 3gs 16gb black/white fido
post.content: per the title, i have 2 bnib iphone 3gs 16gb for sale. 1 black and 1 white. these phones were purchased from fido recently. have receipt for proof. with xmas just around the corner, make it a magical one for that special someone in your life! price: 650 obo
